sourcesContent:
Latest Blog Posts

Butter also has a built in blog engine which makes it dead simple to launch a new company blog.

View All Blog Posts

{{post.title}}
Read More
import {Component, Input, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {Router} from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-blog-section', templateUrl: './blog-section.component.html' }) export class BlogSectionComponent { @Input() posts; constructor(private router: Router) { } onClick(slug) { this.router.navigate(['blog', slug]); } }
